name: gucci horsebit 1955 mini bag
description: Inspired by archival designs, the world of Gucci Horsebit 1955 unifies the original details first introduced over six decades ago with a modern spirit. Part of Gucciâ€™s genetic code, the double ring and bar design has been established as one of the most distinctive elements among the House symbols borrowed from the equestrian world. This mini bag takes on a versatile feel with the addition of a removable card holder.

name: denim dress with web detail
description: The Pre-Fall 2023 collection captures the essence of Gucci. Colours, prints, and emblems appear consistently across time-honored silhouettes, demonstrating the House's ability to reinvent signature pieces season after season. This contemporary dress is presented in a blue lightweight washed denim and further elevated with a heritage-inspired green and red Web stripe.

name: mini gg canvas medium backpack
description: Gucci men's bags push the boundaries of design, constantly reimagining signature travel pieces in unique ways. This backpack blends the historic GG Supreme canvas with a green quilted mini GG canvas, resulting in a modern accessory with vintage appeal.

name: oxford cotton shirt with embroidery
description: Essential pieces in the Pre-Fall 2023 collection are embellished with signature Gucci motifs for the wardrobe. This Oxford cotton shirt has a front chest pocket with a Gucci embroidery.
